@graph.name: Plant bulk RNA-Seq workflow
@graph.description:
Identify upregulated miRNAS and analyze potential targets in downregulated genes.

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Whole transcriptome analysis of Arabidopsis thaliana](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/mirna-target-finder/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
